List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(limit = 10, releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE)

Arguments

limit

Number of events to list.
releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.

Value

List of events.

Examples

# \dontrun{
cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package              Version  Title                                 
#>  + 4 hours admmDensestSubmatrix 0.1.0    Alternating Direction Method of Mul...
#>  + 4 hours BFpack               0.1.0    Flexible Bayes Factor Testing of Sc...
#>  + 5 hours InDisc               1.0.2    Obtaining and Estimating Unidimensi...
#>  + 5 hours MGBT                 1.0.2    Multiple Grubbs-Beck Low-Outlier Te...
#>  + 5 hours geometa              0.6-1    Tools for Reading and Writing ISO/O...
#>  + 5 hours LilRhino             1.2.0    For Implementation of Feed Reductio...
#>  + 5 hours quantities           0.1.3    Quantity Calculus for R Vectors       
#>  + 5 hours Ryacas               1.1.1    R Interface to the 'Yacas' Computer...
#>  + 6 hours tvthemes             1.1.0    TV Show Themes and Color Palettes f...
#>  + 7 hours mkin                 0.9.49.6 Kinetic Evaluation of Chemical Degr...
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package   Version Title                                            
#>  - 10 hours rppo      1.0     Access the Global Plant Phenology Data Portal    
#>  - 10 hours rgho      1.0.1   Access WHO Global Health Observatory Data from...
#>  - 10 hours BayesSUR  1.0-2   Bayesian Seemingly Unrelated Regression          
#>  - 1 day    CRFCSD    2.0     Mixture Cure Generalized Odds Ratio Frailty Mo...
#>  - 1 day    boxoffice 1.3.0   Downloads Box Office Information for Given Dat...
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package              Version Title                                  
#>  + 4 hours admmDensestSubmatrix 0.1.0   Alternating Direction Method of Mult...
#>  + 4 hours BFpack               0.1.0   Flexible Bayes Factor Testing of Sci...
#>  + 5 hours InDisc               1.0.2   Obtaining and Estimating Unidimensio...
#>  + 5 hours MGBT                 1.0.2   Multiple Grubbs-Beck Low-Outlier Tes...
#>  + 5 hours geometa              0.6-1   Tools for Reading and Writing ISO/OG...
# }
